entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -36.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 04:56 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -36.1°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.9°C
Wind: N 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
